rules: Rule1: If the legislation requires the platform to have a license, then the operation is compliant.
Rule2: Whenever the facility is unlicensed, it operates after hours.
Rule3: The sale of alcohol is illegal, provided the facility serves minors.
Rule4: If the inspector issues a warning, then if the inspector observed the facility, then if the facility operates after hours, it serves minors.
Rule5: Provided that the inspector reports a violation, if the inspector observed the facility, then if the facility operates after hours, it serves minors.
Rule6: Whenever it is the facility's first time, the inspector issues a warning.
Rule7: Either it is the facility's first time, or the facility is a repeat offender.
Rule8: If the facility is a repeat offender, then the inspector reports a violation.
Rule9: The operation is compliant, provided the legislation requires the facility to have a license.
Rule10: Either the agency enforces the legislation, or the agency audits the legislation.
Rule11: If the agency audits the legislation, then either the legislation requires the platform to have a license or the legislation requires the facility to have a license.

Rule12: If the agency suspends the license, then if it is not the case that (if it is not the case that if the agency enforces the legislation then either the legislation requires the platform to have a license or the legislation requires the facility to have a license, then the platform violates the law), then the platform is fined by the agency.
Rule13: Either the agency suspends the license, or the agency revokes the license.

Rule14: Provided that the agency revokes the license, if it is not the case that (if it is not the case that if the agency enforces the legislation then either the legislation requires the platform to have a license or the legislation requires the facility to have a license, then the platform violates the law), then the platform is fined by the agency.
Rule15: Under the condition that the facility sells alcohol, the facility is unlicensed.

Rule16: Either the facility sells alcohol, or if the agency enforces the legislation then either the legislation requires the platform to have a license or the legislation requires the facility to have a license.

Rule17: If it is not the case that (if it is not the case that if the agency enforces the legislation then either the legislation requires the platform to have a license or the legislation requires the facility to have a license, then the platform violates the law), then it is not the case that the platform is fined by the agency.
facts: Fact1: The inspector observed the facility.
Fact2: It is not the case that the sale of alcohol is illegal.
Fact3: The platform does not violate the law.
